credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
title: Design for Window Drapery
description:
Horizontal rectangle. Design for the Royal Pavilion, Brighton. Design for window drapery, with swags of blue, lined in yellow and hung with tassels, surmounted by a valence in three tiers of red, blue, and yellow. Indications of measurements in ink. Generally associated with preceding designs.

Original album associated with this collection still exists.  See 1948-40-1 accessory
name: Drawing
